DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate German Version NDI sensitive change time .
DOC.brief_title: Responsiveness German Version Neck Disability Index ( NDI-G )
DOC.detailed_description: Chronic neck pain patient ask participate study . The participant ask fill NDI begin study seven week . Additionally participant fill PGIC .
DOC.criteria: Chronic neck pain 18 year old informed consent able speak , write read German . Any problem may exclude Manual Therapy treatment cervical spine e.g fracture
